item.description:
Hi all,

Stop the Wars Coalition will be meeting from 6:00 PM â€“ 7:00 PM tomorrow to discuss the upcoming fundraising party to be held on October 25th at E5. This meeting will be followed by the Outreach Committee of the October 11 Mobilizing Committee at 7:00. Please bring your ideas, energy, and enthusiasm.

Plans for the October 11 mobilization are moving forward and the permits have been secured. Endorsements for the action are steadily coming in and much of our focus now is on getting out the word about the protest. Your help and ideas are greatly needed in this final week leading up to the mobilization.

The Outreach Committee of the October 11 Mobilizing Committee will be meeting on Monday (tomorrow) at 7:00 PM at

Encuentro 5
33 Harrison Ave, 5th Floor
Boston, MA
item.name: Antiwar Meetup
